images.copyright: Dyavolski Most (Devil's Bridge) over the Arda River in Bulgaria (© Petar Mladenov/Alamy)
images.title: Does this crossing carry a curse?
images.caption: Dyavolski Most
images.desc: You've heard of a bridge over troubled waters, but what if the bridge is troubled too? Legend tells of a Bulgarian stonemason, Dimitar, who was tasked with solving a bridge problem here in the early 1500s. Dimitar was hired to construct a crossing that wouldn't collapse into the rushing Arda River, as had all previous spans in this strange spot.
images.bsTitle: Does this crossing carry a curse?
